replies.msg:
各位大英帝國做緊嘢／將會做嘢嘅巴絲打，歡迎入嚟呢到鳩噏扮下工

Q&A credit to 滑蛋豬仔飯

Q: 如果無BC又想係英國打工係咪好難?

A:
通常會比working visa一係大公司
D細公司仔都見過有批不過當然會少D

老老實實渣BNO/特區係就係難D不過都唔係無可能
都識得有人搞得掂個visa
以前有同學會係cv度寫明話要working visa
如果間公司都肯in你既話多數即係肯批
唔洗浪費大家時間
大小公司都有 試下無妨

再唔係學其他巴打講
申請左working holiday做住先都未嘗不可
當然之後整唔整到tier 2 working visa就唔敢講
不過起碼都有2年比你係度做下野儲下經驗先

如果做開比較專業行業既朋友其實拎左working holiday visa先，再轉tier 2既機會都幾樂觀，都識幾個朋友都係咁，好似都係做design / I.T.之類 (by 賽麗娜Serena)


Q: 想問下英國見工係咪同香港一樣都係上網報?

A:
如果你話搵工過程其實同香港差唔多
睇你咩工啦
普通黎講大公司既話都係cv cover letter -> online test -> phone in-> assessment centre ( 可以好多round) -> final in
細公司就少幾個步驟咁


Q: 想問下係咪bno 同特區都可以fg 一年tier5 先，唔洗特登要搵肯比tier2 既公司住

A:
你英國畢業定香港想過去？ 唔係英國畢業唔肯定當地申請有無唔同但BNO 隨時可以申請tier 5 重有兩年，特區要抽架，都係兩年。
當地申請可能短d , 我當初因爲公司未令到可以簽visa 既licence 就幫我申請住tier 5 先，得特區又過左抽籤所以係visa 公司幫我係英國申請，但咁就得一年.. 無深究點解。
但全部香港申請過去既都有兩年。 (by 花生哥)

Q: 下年打算去working holiday 會唔會好難搵工同搵地方住（想住反係zoom1,2) 聽人講就話最好係香港搵定先去係好定唔好 我就做開酒吧個邊會唔會香港人 真心求教

A:
英國bar tender既需求量其實好大 因為佢pub既數量基本上同香港7仔有得揮 甚至係正常既餐廳入面都會有間pub仔/bar比人淨飲野吹水
所以你有經驗根本唔洗驚 去到英國任何一個地方都一定搵到野做

講我自己經驗啦 我就做好typical既西餐廳既 入面全部鬼佬
因為要升supervisor 所以gm要求我識哂餐廳所有部份 包括floor hatch同bar
Bar嗰邊我完全係一張白紙 連用咖啡機都唔識 基本上淨係識開水喉倒果汁呢d白痴都識做既野
去到依家講緊一個在既時間 叫做忙起上黎可以打哂三邊 聽日冇人返比人編左去自己睇bar

我覺得做bar最緊要係識同客吹水 尤其係餐廳bar
好似我地咁 係住宅區 長期都有熟客日日黎打"等" 真係日日風雨不改黎報到
黎到冇野做咪同bar tender吹水囉 所以你一定要好吹得

其餘都冇乜野擔心 驚咪去indeed search下囉 一大炸請緊人 (by 小野屋杏)

Q: 英國黎緊暑假畢業，準備搵工 （宜家4月中係咪太遲)

A: 唔遲
雖然有啲係截左
但仲有好多
留學生有優勢 就係唔怕relocation
成個英國既工你都apply得
宜家真係開始send cv都唔會太遲既
好多大公司如果唔係grad scheme既話其實一路都請緊人
以前好多同學都係8/9月先有offer
有D直頭下年1月先有工開
所以唔洗擔心既肯踏出第一步搵工就ok (by 馬壯FN2)

If you are getting an UK Tier 2 (General) visa and have British National (Overseas) status, you should get your UK Tier 2 visa using your BN(O) passport. This is because -

1) BN(O) passport holders with a long term UK visa do not need to register with the local police while HKSAR passport holders, as Chinese nationals, are required to register with the local police.

2) BN(O) passport holders with long term UK visas are treated as Commonwealth citizens in the UK. He/She can register to vote in all UK elections. HKSAR passport holders cannot register to vote in any UK elections. Being on the electoral roll helps you to build up your own credit history in the UK.

3) BN(O) passport holders can apply for British civil service jobs open to Commonwealth citizens once he/she has Indefinite Leave to Remain (ILR) while HKSAR passport holders cannot apply for British civil service jobs until he/she has become a British Citizen.

4) BN(O) passport holders can apply for registration to become a British Citizen using form B(OTA), this is a cheaper method than naturalisation. HKSAR passport holder must naturalise in order to get British Citizenship.

https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/application-to-register-as-a-british-citizen-form-bota

A number of points for those of you who got British Citizenship via your parent and living in Hong Kong -

1) You are very likely to be a British Citizen by descent. This means that your child born outside of the UK will not automatically receive British Citizenship.

2) You can move back to the UK at any time you wanted. All you need is a valid British Citizen passport.

3) You cannot get UK welfare benefit until you lived in the UK for three months.

4) However, you can use the National Health Service (NHS) as soon as you are in the UK.

5) You will need to get a National Insurance (NI) Number. You can only apply for a NI number in the UK. Please see link below for details -

https://www.gov.uk/apply-national-insurance-number

6) You will not be entitle to UK 'home' student fees until you lived in the UK for at lease three years before the start of the course.

7) If you want to give birth in the UK in order to get British Citizenship for your child, I would suggest you to do so in Northern Ireland (Belfast for example). A child born in Northern Ireland with at lease one British Citizen parent is also entitle to Irish citizenship (as well as British Citizenship). Irish citizenship remains an EU citizenship after Brexit, which means that the child have the freedom of movement in the EU.

8) Banking - you can open UK bank accounts in Hong Kong with the HSBC or the Bank of East Asia. Please note that HSBC will charge a fee.

More points -

1) You can exchange your Hong Kong driving licence to an UK one without test in the UK as long as you pass your driving test in Hong Kong and you lived in the UK for less than 5 years.

https://www.facebook.com/HongkongerinUK/posts/861886470578180:0

2) You can renew your British passport (whether it is a British Citizen or British National (Overseas) passport) in Hong Kong online.

https://www.gov.uk/overseas-passports

The thread (『薪火post』BNO 續期資訊(13) 說好的法治呢?) below gives you all the information you need to renew your British passport in Hong Kong -

https://lihkg.com/thread/434850/page/1

Thats correct, you can drive with your Hong Kong driving licence or a Hong Kong issued International Driving Permit (IDP - 國際牌) in the UK. The 185 day rule was there to stop tourist coming over to exchange their licences. Any person given six months leave to enter the UK will not be able to stay in the UK for more than 185 days in a given year.

You will need to send in your Hong Kong driving licence in order to exchange for an UK driving licence without test. DVLA will not return your Hong Kong driving licence after the exchange. Having an IDP (國際牌) gives you something to prove that you can drive in the UK while you sent your Hong Kong driving licence away for the exchange.

You may need to prove to the DVLA that you gained your Hong Kong driving licence by passing a driving test in Hong Kong.

英倫追夢 誕首名港產御林軍樂手

http://orientaldaily.on.cc/cnt/news/20170813/00176_045.html

David憶述，源於幾年前一次聚餐時偶遇英國陸軍音樂總監，對方提起英國御林軍樂隊招募新隊員，他持有英國國民海外護照（BNO）身份也可參與招聘考試，故決定一試。軍樂隊考試分兩部分，體能為先，音樂第二。對於當年三十三歲的他來說，體能測試是極大的挑戰，首輪面試便因跑步不達標而失敗。但他並沒有放棄，返港苦操三、四個月後，二○一三年通過所有測試，成功取錄。

要成為正式御林軍，需接受長達半年基本訓練及音樂訓練，全天候廿四小時入住軍營及絕對服從命令。而David隸屬陸軍部隊軍樂隊Band of the Grenadier Guards，日常工作主要為白金漢宮每兩日一次換兵儀式伴奏，帶領新兵接替舊兵當值；軍樂隊亦在大型歡迎儀式演奏歡迎國家元首，他曾有幸接待國家主席習近平，又曾參與英女王壽辰的閱兵儀式等。他憑於軍隊的優秀表現及領導才能，入伍兩年後，即從單簧管樂手升為首席單簧管樂手。他現長居英國，還有一年可入籍，目標是繼續在軍隊攀升，成為終身職業。

A number of points for you to consider -

1) Banks in Northern Ireland (like Ulster Bank and the Bank of Ireland) issued their own GBP banknotes. These Northern Irish banknotes may have limited recognition outside Northern Ireland. (You may find shopkeepers in England refusing to accept Northern Irish banknotes)

2) You can exchange your Hong Kong driving licence to a Northern Ireland one without test as long as you passed your driving test in Hong Kong. Please see link below for details -

https://www.nidirect.gov.uk/articles/exchanging-your-foreign-driving-licence

3) Once you are in Belfast, you need to get a National Insurance number from the Department for Works and Pensions -

https://www.gov.uk/apply-national-insurance-number

4) You may want to open an UK bank account in Hong Kong with HSBC before moving to Belfast. Please see link below for details -

https://www.hsbc.com.hk/personal/hsbc-premier/features/premier-overseas-account.html

5) Do you have BN(O) status? I would suggest that you use your BN(O) passport to apply for your UK Working Holiday visa. BN(O) passport holders can apply for an UK Working Holiday visa at any time.

You cannot go to the specialist in the UK without going through your GP. Your GP is the gatekeeper in the health care system.

What your wife will need to do once she is in the UK are as follows -

1) register with a GP medical practice
2) Make an appointment to see the GP (see whether this can be done at the same time as she register) and then get the GP to refer her to a neurology specialist.
3) If your GP is going to refer your wife to see a specialist, you can ask the GP to refer your wife to the specialist with the shortest waiting time (or the hospital nearest to your home) - however, this may mean that the appointment she will get is not at the nearest hospital from your home. I was once been referred to a dermatology department about 5 miles from my home rather than the nearest one (half a mile) as the hospital further away has a shorter waiting time.

If you are going to apply for her spouse visa at the end of January 2018, I would suggest your wife to have medical tests and MRI scan done as well as having a private consultation with a neurology specialist in Hong Kong as suggest by the doctor in Hong Kong. I would also suggest that during the private consultation in Hong Kong, ask the Hong Kong specialist to write a report on your wife's medical conditions based on the latest tests and MRI scan results in English so that you have something to show the GP in the UK.

I just had a quick look at the GMC's website for the three doctors in the neurology department in Ashford Hospital. It appears that Mr David Barnes is a very experience specialist in Neurology. He got his medical degree from Liverpool in 1980 and he has been on the Neurology specialist register since 1996.

千奇唔好去英國

1. 除非你讀神科（law, computer science, finance）或名校（牛劍LSE Imperial畢業）畢業，英國畢業生fresh grad人工月入得HKD15000 - HKD22000 我識有d醫科畢業最初以為距地人工好吧幣，點知距地一畢業都系每月搵HKD25000 to HKD35000
https://www.graduate-jobs.com/gco/Booklet/graduate-salary-salaries.jsp
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-34475955

2. 英國好多醉酒鬼禮拜五禮拜六晚就係街到嘔吐，大聲唱歌，胡亂大叫，甚至打人。我係倫敦住都唔算見得多，但我以前係曼城讀書就有好多鬼仔版廢青成日飲醉，分分鐘比香港既廢青7過一百倍

3. 對中高收入人士重稅。月入HKD50000 (即年新£45000）後個人入息稅係40%
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/rates-and-allowances-income-tax/income-tax-rates-and-allowances-current-and-past

4. 英國鬼妹普遍唔系咁鍾意東亞人，距地比較中意食白腸，然後食黑腸 係倫敦既跨種族怕拖都系見東亞女拖住洋腸，好少見東亞男拖鬼妹。我地既東亞既孝順&面子文化的確系令到男仔怕醜，唔敢追女仔。

5. 英國治安日益漸差，尤其系東倫敦地區近幾年兇案同埋酸性液體攻擊頻繁
https://www.findahood.com/articles/crime/londons-top-10-most-dangerous-boroughs/8
http://hk.on.cc/int/bkn/cnt/news/20170924/bknint-20170924042333055-0924_17011_001.html

6. 隨住近年有色人種（黑人，南亞人，中東人，東亞人）大舉移民英國，英國白人系2060年會變少數族裔，到時候連王室掌管人都唔系白人，到時候英國文化會比徹底消滅。好似香港係2047前已經被大陸化
https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2000/sep/03/race.world

7. 英國食唐餐好貴，買一件碟頭飯至少都要HKD70（倫敦以外地區可能平少少)

8. 倫敦交通費&房租好貴。倫敦房租同香港一樣都要每個月萬幾蚊港紙（除非你同人一齊住）。倫敦交通費貴香港一倍，但倫敦地鐵就落後過大陸既鐵路，地鐵列車連手機訊號都收唔到。
https://www.timeout.com/london/blog/this-tube-map-shows-the-average-rent-costs-near-every-underground-station-092915

利申：90後港豬係倫敦過住中產生活

1. 除非你讀神科（law, computer science, finance）或名校（牛劍LSE Imperial畢業）畢業，英國畢業生fresh grad人工月入得HKD15000 - HKD22000 我識有d醫科畢業最初以為距地人工好吧幣，點知距地一畢業都系每月搵HKD25000 to HKD35000
https://www.graduate-jobs.com/gco/Booklet/graduate-salary-salaries.jsp
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-34475955

2. 英國好多醉酒鬼禮拜五禮拜六晚就係街到嘔吐，大聲唱歌，胡亂大叫，甚至打人。我係倫敦住都唔算見得多，但我以前係曼城讀書就有好多鬼仔版廢青成日飲醉，分分鐘比香港既廢青7過一百倍

3. 對中高收入人士重稅。月入HKD50000 (即年新£45000）後個人入息稅係40%
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/rates-and-allowances-income-tax/income-tax-rates-and-allowances-current-and-past

4. 英國鬼妹普遍唔系咁鍾意東亞人，距地比較中意食白腸，然後食黑腸 係倫敦既跨種族怕拖都系見東亞女拖住洋腸，好少見東亞男拖鬼妹。我地既東亞既孝順&面子文化的確系令到男仔怕醜，唔敢追女仔。

5. 英國治安日益漸差，尤其系東倫敦地區近幾年兇案同埋酸性液體攻擊頻繁
https://www.findahood.com/articles/crime/londons-top-10-most-dangerous-boroughs/8
http://hk.on.cc/int/bkn/cnt/news/20170924/bknint-20170924042333055-0924_17011_001.html

6. 隨住近年有色人種（黑人，南亞人，中東人，東亞人）大舉移民英國，英國白人系2060年會變少數族裔，到時候連王室掌管人都唔系白人，到時候英國文化會比徹底消滅。好似香港係2047前已經被大陸化
https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2000/sep/03/race.world

7. 英國食唐餐好貴，買一件碟頭飯至少都要HKD70（倫敦以外地區可能平少少)

8. 倫敦交通費&房租好貴。倫敦房租同香港一樣都要每個月萬幾蚊港紙（除非你同人一齊住）。倫敦交通費貴香港一倍，但倫敦地鐵就落後過大陸既鐵路，地鐵列車連手機訊號都收唔到。
https://www.timeout.com/london/blog/this-tube-map-shows-the-average-rent-costs-near-every-underground-station-092915

利申：90後港豬係倫敦過住中產生活

WFC
唔鍾意嚟咪唔好嚟

1. 除非你讀神科（law, computer science, finance）或名校（牛劍LSE Imperial畢業）畢業，英國畢業生fresh grad人工月入得HKD15000 - HKD22000 我識有d醫科畢業最初以為距地人工好吧幣，點知距地一畢業都系每月搵HKD25000 to HKD35000
https://www.graduate-jobs.com/gco/Booklet/graduate-salary-salaries.jsp
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-34475955

2. 英國好多醉酒鬼禮拜五禮拜六晚就係街到嘔吐，大聲唱歌，胡亂大叫，甚至打人。我係倫敦住都唔算見得多，但我以前係曼城讀書就有好多鬼仔版廢青成日飲醉，分分鐘比香港既廢青7過一百倍

3. 對中高收入人士重稅。月入HKD50000 (即年新£45000）後個人入息稅係40%
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/rates-and-allowances-income-tax/income-tax-rates-and-allowances-current-and-past

4. 英國鬼妹普遍唔系咁鍾意東亞人，距地比較中意食白腸，然後食黑腸 係倫敦既跨種族怕拖都系見東亞女拖住洋腸，好少見東亞男拖鬼妹。我地既東亞既孝順&面子文化的確系令到男仔怕醜，唔敢追女仔。

5. 英國治安日益漸差，尤其系東倫敦地區近幾年兇案同埋酸性液體攻擊頻繁
https://www.findahood.com/articles/crime/londons-top-10-most-dangerous-boroughs/8
http://hk.on.cc/int/bkn/cnt/news/20170924/bknint-20170924042333055-0924_17011_001.html

6. 隨住近年有色人種（黑人，南亞人，中東人，東亞人）大舉移民英國，英國白人系2060年會變少數族裔，到時候連王室掌管人都唔系白人，到時候英國文化會比徹底消滅。好似香港係2047前已經被大陸化
https://www.theguardian.com/uk/2000/sep/03/race.world

7. 英國食唐餐好貴，買一件碟頭飯至少都要HKD70（倫敦以外地區可能平少少)

8. 倫敦交通費&房租好貴。倫敦房租同香港一樣都要每個月萬幾蚊港紙（除非你同人一齊住）。倫敦交通費貴香港一倍，但倫敦地鐵就落後過大陸既鐵路，地鐵列車連手機訊號都收唔到。
https://www.timeout.com/london/blog/this-tube-map-shows-the-average-rent-costs-near-every-underground-station-092915

利申：90後港豬係倫敦過住中產生活

WFC

除左搵唔到女之外都冇咩問題呀

https://hk.lifestyle.appledaily.com/etw/magazine/article/20171228/3_57632928/-%E9%99%84%E5%BA%97%E9%8B%AA%E6%8E%A8%E4%BB%8B-%E5%80%AB%E6%95%A6%E5%B0%8B%E7%9C%9F-%E7%82%B8%E9%AD%9A%E8%96%AF%E6%A2%9D-%E5%92%AA%E9%A3%9F%E9%9B%AA%E8%97%8F%E8%B2%A8-%E5%92%81%E5%A4%9A%E9%AD%9A%E7%A8%AE%E9%82%8A%E7%A8%AE%E6%9C%80%E5%A5%BD%E9%A3%9F-

推介位於東區的Poppies，兩大賣點：環境經典(東倫敦復古風)，用料講究(只用新鮮魚)。鮮魚全來自蘇格蘭東部的Peterhand漁港，漁穫晚上到岸，翌日早上鮮宰再送店，新鮮得很，難怪入口全無魚腥味。

Poppies
地址：6-8 Hanbury Street
電話：+44 020 7247 0892

btw - it is Peterhead in Scotland, not Peterhand! (鮮魚全來自蘇格蘭東部的Peterhand漁港)

Worth a try?

東網透視：憑一支單簧管　香港仔入選御林軍

http://202.125.90.17/hk/bkn/cnt/news/20170812/bkn-20170812093047180-0812_00822_001.html

以香港第一人身份成爲英國御林軍樂手，David憶述，源於幾年前一次聚餐時偶遇英國陸軍音樂總監，對方提起英國御林軍樂隊招募新隊員，他持有英國國民(海外)護照(BNO)身份也可參與招聘考試，故決定一試。軍樂隊考試分兩部分，體能為先，音樂第二。對於當年33歲的他來說，體能測試是極大的挑戰，要10分半鐘內跑完2.4公里，亦要做掌上壓及仰臥起坐，首輪面試因跑步不達標而失敗。但他並沒有放棄，返港苦操3、4個月後再接受挑戰，2013年過關斬將通過所有測試，成功取錄。

身為英皇室的御林軍，薪酬福利令人關注，David則不予透露，僅指薪金水平較香港警察低一些，除普通的醫療和交通福利外，最優厚是住房福利，他與同事在倫敦市中心合住一間800至900平方呎單位，月租只需30英鎊，僅相當於300港元，相信令不少香港青年人羨慕。他現長居英國，還有一年便可入籍，目標是繼續在軍隊攀升，成爲終身職業。

取錄左係咪會幫你搞埋visa? - Once you are a full time member of the British Armed Forces, you are no longer subject to British immigration control.

http://www.army.mod.uk/welfare-support/23209.aspx

A member of the Regular Armed Forces (Royal Navy, British Army or Royal Air Force) who is subject to service law is exempt immigration control under Section 8(4) of the immigration act 1971 (except for the provisions relating to deportation).

Have a look at this thread in LIHKG below for more information on BN(O) passport holders joining the British Armed Forces -

BNO與其去做慈母　不如加入英軍

https://lihkg.com/thread/422251/page/1
